movies.title: Central Intelligence
movies.description: Accountant Calvin Joyner's life changes drastically after Bob Stone, his old classmate from high school, drags him into a dubious covert operation.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.description: Don Vito Corleone, head of a mafia family, decides to hand over his empire to his youngest son Michael. However, his decision unintentionally puts the lives of his loved ones in grave danger.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.

movies.title: The Green Mile
movies.description: Paul, the head guard of a prison, meets an inmate, John, an African American who is accused of murdering two girls. His life changes drastically when he discovers that John has a special gift.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.description: Commodus takes over power and demotes Maximus, one of the preferred generals of his father, Emperor Marcus Aurelius. As a result, Maximus is relegated to fighting till death as a gladiator.

movies.title: The Dictator
movies.description: Aladeen, a brutal dictator, travels to New York in order to address the United Nations Security Council. However, his plans go south when a hitman hired by his uncle, Tamir, kidnaps him.
